system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: On hit, all valid targets lose 75% of their current HP.
Requirement: [Tapu Fini], [Tapu Koko], [Tapu Bulu], or [Tapu Lele] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Nature's Madness on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Guardian of Alola

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
